title: Investigation of the nanostructure and reactivity of soot particulates from diesel/methanol dual-fuel combustion with and without EGR
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,1012-1023
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01701J, Paper
Hao Chen, Zhenhua Ji, Xiaochen Wang, Mingzhang Pan, Chengshan Yi, Peng Zhang
Independently of the methanol substitutions, introducing EGR for diesel/methanol dual-fuel combustion lowers soot oxidation reactivity and this trend is highly linked with the more ordered nanostructure.
